title: 48V 50A Li-ion BMS Board
shortDescription: High-current Battery Management System designed for 13S lithium-ion battery packs with comprehensive protection features for UPS applications.
fullDescription: The 48V 50A Li-ion BMS Board is engineered for demanding UPS applications requiring reliable power management. Featuring double-layered PCB construction and advanced protection circuitry, this BMS ensures optimal battery performance and longevity. Typically used with 13S lithium-ion battery packs where each cell has a nominal voltage of 3.7V.

title: 60V 100A Li-ion BMS Board
shortDescription: Premium high-power Battery Management System for 16S lithium-ion configurations with advanced monitoring and communication interfaces.
fullDescription: The 60V 100A Li-ion BMS Board delivers exceptional performance for high-voltage lithium-ion applications. Typically designed for 16S battery packs with 3.7V cells resulting in 59.2V nominal voltage. Features peak current handling of 120-150A for short bursts, sophisticated cell balancing, and communication interfaces like UART, CAN bus, or Bluetooth for advanced monitoring.

title: 36V 40A Li-ion BMS Board
shortDescription: Compact and efficient Battery Management System for 16S or 14S lithium-ion battery packs with intelligent protection.
fullDescription: The 36V 40A Li-ion BMS Board offers an excellent balance of performance and affordability. Designed for 16S lithium-ion battery packs with 3.7V cells or 14S configurations with 4.2V per cell. Features peak current of 120-150A for short bursts and comprehensive protection including over-charge, over-discharge, short-circuit, and over-temperature protection.

title: 60V 50A Li-ion BMS Board
shortDescription: Robust Battery Management System for 16S lithium-ion battery packs with 4mm thick double-layered PCB for enhanced durability.
fullDescription: The 60V 50A Li-ion BMS Board is built for reliability with its 4mm thick double-layered PCB construction. Typically designed for 16S lithium-ion battery packs with 3.7V nominal voltage per cell. Compact design fits within battery enclosures while providing comprehensive protection and monitoring capabilities.

title: 12V 20A Li-Ion BMS Board
shortDescription: Compact Battery Management System for 3S or 4S lithium-ion battery packs, ideal for smaller applications and enclosures.
fullDescription: The 12V 20A Li-Ion BMS Board is designed for 3S or 4S lithium-ion battery packs where each cell has a nominal voltage of 3.7V. 3S configuration gives 11.1V nominal while 4S gives 14.8V nominal. Compact size makes it suitable for integration into smaller battery packs, e-bikes, power tools, and portable power stations.

title: 51.2V 100A Li-Ion BMS Board
shortDescription: High-capacity Battery Management System for 16S LiFePO4 battery packs with advanced communication ports for monitoring.
fullDescription: The 51.2V 100A Li-Ion BMS Board is typically used with 16S lithium-ion battery packs where each cell has a nominal voltage of 3.2V, common for LiFePO4 chemistry. Features communication ports for advanced monitoring such as UART, I2C, or CAN bus. Includes voltage sense harness, temperature sense harness (NTC), vehicle/load/charger interface harness, and LED buzzer module.

title: Electronic Development Boards
shortDescription: Versatile development board featuring ARM Cortex-M or ESP32 microcontroller for signal processing, data acquisition, and control logic.
fullDescription: Our Electronic Development Boards are designed for prototyping and development of monitoring systems. Features a microcontroller (ARM Cortex-M series, ESP32, or similar) for signal processing, data acquisition, and control logic. Includes signal conditioning circuitry with operational amplifiers, filters, and ADCs. Display interface supports LCD, OLED, or e-ink displays depending on requirements.
